item.title: Why I'm into working out lately
item.description: I think ‚ÄúEverything depends on probability‚Äù. As a wrote, As I mentioned, regardless of ability, everything is governed by probability. Even if you study hard, there is a chance of getting a low score; even if you study investment, there is a chance of losing money; and even if you prepare thoroughly for a job, there is a chance of not getting into the company you want.

item.title: 01. The oldest memories
item.description: My oldest memory is of me crossing the crosswalk with my hand raised above. But there‚Äôs was a problem. When I was young, I was so foolish that I didn‚Äôt know how to look at traffic lights.

item.title: 01. Prologue
item.description: My personal philosophy about life has been influenced a lot by Buddha. I don‚Äôt know much about Buddhist teachings, but I think it‚Äôs because I believe there isn‚Äôt a phrase more universally applicable to the entirety of human life than ‚Äòlife is suffering‚Äô.

item.title: Everything depends on probability
item.description: In the world, everything depends on probability. Studying for an exam is an act of increasing the probability of getting a high score in the exam, while studying stocks is an act of increasing the probability of gaining profits in the stock market.
